meanings.definition: Move quickly in an erratic or fluttering manner.
meanings.sent1: The butterfly was flittering around the garden.
meanings.sent2: The leaves were flittering in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The flittering squirrel made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was flittering with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The flittering bird caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The hummingbird was flittering from flower to flower.
meanings.sent2: The curtains were flittering in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The flittering puppy chased its tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were flittering all over the place.
meanings.sent5: The flittering dragonfly darted across the pond.
